name: Sol Flower
description:
A short survival game of a sea-slug flower?

A game I made as part of my education to make games! All art assets made by me, except the shephards tone track. 

Controls: 
Arrow Keys - Move
Space - Jump
Hold Down Arrow Key - Superjump

Collect sunlight as it bounces around in order to survive as long as possible! When you get to low health, a shephards tone will play as death approaches. It's a little loud, so I recommend turning down the sound for this one, haha.
